flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: DUSTOX is instinctively drawn to light.nSwarms of this POKéMON are attractednby the bright lights of cities, wherefthey wreak havoc by stripping thenleaves off roadside trees for food.

When DUSTOX flaps its wings, a finendust is scattered all over. This dust isnactually a powerful poison that willfeven make a pro wrestler sick.nThis POKéMON searches for food usingnits antennae like radar.
It is a nocturnal POKéMON that flies fromnfields and mountains to the attraction ofnstreetlights at night. It looses highlyntoxic powder from its wings.
It scatters horribly toxic dust when itnsenses danger. They tend to gather in thenglow of streetlamps at night.
It scatters horribly toxic dust when itnsenses danger. They tend to gather in thenglow of streetlamps at night.
A nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn bynstreetlights, they messily eat thenleaves of trees lining boulevards.
It violently flutters its wings tonscatter toxic dust when attacked.nIt becomes active after sunset.
Toxic powder is scattered with eachnflap. At night, it is known to stripnleaves off trees lining boulevards.
It scatters its fine dust all overnwhen it is attacked. It is annocturnal Pokémon.
It scatters its fine dust all overnwhen it is attacked. It is annocturnal Pokémon.
Il disperse un nuage de poudrentoxique à chaque coup d’aile. Ilnaime les feuilles d’arbres urbains.
Toxic powder is scattered with eachnflap. At night, it is known to stripnleaves off trees lining boulevards.
Il disperse un nuage de poudrentoxique à chaque coup d’aile. Ilnaime les feuilles d’arbres urbains.
Toxic powder is scattered with eachnflap. At night, it is known to stripnleaves off trees lining boulevards.
Toxic powder is scattered with eachnflap. At night, it is known to stripnleaves off trees lining boulevards.
Toxic powder is scattered with eachnflap. At night, it is known to stripnleaves off trees lining boulevards.
やこうせいの　ポケモン。nあかりに　さそわれた　ドクケイルがnがいろじゅの　はを　くいちらかす。
야행성 포켓몬이다. 불빛에n이끌려나온 독케일이 가로수의n잎을 헤적거리며 먹어댄다.
Ce Pokémon nocturne est attiré par les lueurs denla ville et aime les feuilles des arbres urbains.
Nachtaktives Pokémon, das vom Licht der Stadtnangezogen wird und dort die Blätter der Bäume frisst.
Pokémon nocturno. Atraído por las luces de la ciudad,nse come las hojas y arbustos de las avenidas.
Pokémon notturno. Attirato dalla luce dei lampioni,ndivora le foglie degli alberi lungo i viali.
A nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, theynmessily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.
夜行性の　ポケモン。n明かりに　誘われた　ドクケイルがn街路樹の　葉を　食い散らかす。
おそわれると　はげしく　はばたいてnもうどくの　こなを　まきちらす。nひがくれると　こうどうを　はじめる。
습격당하면 격하게 날개를 쳐서n맹독 가루를 흩뿌린다.n날이 저물면 행동을 시작한다.
Quand on l’attaque, il bat des ailes pour répandre sanpoudre toxique. Il sort après le coucher du soleil.
Wird es angegriffen, flattert es mit den Flügelnnund verteilt giftigen Puder. Es ist nachtaktiv.
Cuando se le ataca, bate las alas con fuerza paranesparcir polvo tóxico. Es un Pokémon nocturno.
Se attaccato, sbatte con forza le ali e sparge unanpolvere tossica. Lo si vede in giro dopo il tramonto.
It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dustnwhen attacked. It becomes active after sunset.
襲われると　激しく　羽ばたいてn猛毒の　粉を　まき散らす。n日が暮れると　行動を　はじめる。
あかりに　ひきよせられる　しゅうせいを　もつ。nまちあかりに　さそわれた　ドクケイルの　むれがnがいろじゅの　はっぱを　たべちらかしてしまう。
불빛에 이끌리는 습성을 지녔다.n거리의 불빛에 유인된 독케일 무리가n가로수의 잎을 어지르며 먹어버린다.

Papinox est instinctivement attiré par la lumière. Des nuéesnde ce Pokémon sont attirées par les réverbères des villes,noù il sème la pagaille en grignotant les feuilles des arbresnen bordure de route.
Pudox wird instinktiv vom Licht angezogen. In hellnerleuchteten Städten kann man Scharen dieser Pokémonndabei beobachten, wie sie großen Schaden anrichten,nindem sie die Blätter von Bäumen abfressen.

Los Dustox se acercan a la luz de forma instintiva. De hecho,nse agrupan en enjambres alrededor de las luces de lasnciudades y causan estragos en las hojas de los árboles quenestán a pie de calle para alimentarse.

Dustox è istintivamente attratto dalla luce. Nugoli di questinPokémon sono attirati dalla luce intensa delle città, dovencausano danni ingenti strappando le foglie delle piantendi cui si nutrono lungo le strade urbane.
Dustox is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this Pokémonnare attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreaknhavoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.
灯りに　引き寄せられる　習性を　持つ。n街灯りに　誘われた　ドクケイルの　群れがn街路樹の　葉っぱを　食べ散らかしてしまう。
はばたくと　こまかい　こなが　まいあがる。nすいこむと　プロレスラーも　ねこむ　もうどくだ。nしょっかくの　レーダーで　エサを　さがす。
날갯짓하면 미세한 가루가 날린다.n들이마시면 프로레슬러도 잠드는 맹독이다.n더듬이의 레이더로 먹이를 찾는다.

Lorsque Papinox bat des ailes, une légère poussièrense répand. Cette poussière est en fait un puissant poisonncapable de mettre au tapis un boxeur professionnel.nCe Pokémon cherche sa nourriture avec ses antennes,ncomme un radar.

Wenn Pudox mit den Flügeln schlägt, verteilt es einennfeinen Puder. Es handelt sich um ein starkes Gift,ndas sogar einen Profiboxer umhauen würde. Bei dernFuttersuche benutzt dieses Pokémon seine Antennennals Radar.

Cuando Dustox bate las alas, libera un polvillo fino que ennrealidad es un peligroso veneno que puede resultar dañinonhasta al más fuerte de los fuertes. Las antenas le sirven denradar para buscar comida.

Quando agita le ali, Dustox sparge una polvere sottilentutt’intorno. In realtà si tratta di un potente veleno capacendi mettere al tappeto anche un campione di lotta libera.nPer cercare il cibo usa le antenne come un radar.

When Dustox flaps its wings, a fine dust is scattered all over.nThis dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make anpro wrestler sick. This Pokémon searches for food using itsnantennae like radar.
羽ばたくと　細かい　粉が　舞い上がる。n吸いこむと　プロレスラーも　寝込む　猛毒だ。n触角の　レーダーで　エサを　探す。
